My 1st order came with a used tank top from a totally different brand and I was very upset. When I got my replacement order, I got the correct item.I removed a star for the situation and the wait.  However, the top is wonderful and I love it. I typically wear a medium in any top- I'm 5'7" and 137 lbs. 34C.  I ordered this in a large based on reviews it fits perfectly.  It's extremely comfortable. The fabric is high quality, and buttery soft. I love the double layer of the fabric! It's not at all see through, and just more comfortable than most tanks. The square neck gives it a very sexy look on the decolatage area. Spelled that wrong I think. If you're busy at all, or wear a push up bra with it... wow! My husband loves it! The fabric has a significant amount of stretch and holds nice to the body. It doesn't look all wrinkly along the main body area, which I like. It IS shorter than the average, but it isn't a crop top. I would say it comes down (on me) right to where the top of a pair of regular jeans would land on the waist. I got the black one but will be ordering more colors now that I've worn it. As long as I receive the correct top in unused condition, I will be very happy. I recommend trying it! Order a size larger than usual for a good fit though.

评论概述: Soft and Stylish but Runs Small

评论概述: Stains for no reason/ wouldn’t repurchase
评论详情: I loved the material and compression of the shirt. I bought one in white and one in lavender. The white one unfortunately got a little bit of Star Gazer Lily pollen on it (that pollen stains everything) And I couldn’t get it out with any type of cleaner. now it’s just an undershirt. Now the lavender one. I only wore twice and I don’t use bleach on my laundry, not even whites. And I pulled it out of my drawer today to find this large stain. I wouldnt recommend buying these shirts. Everything is great but for some reason can only wear them a couple times before a mysterious stain appears. Maybe the coloring they use are too sensitive to soaps and discolors after a few washes?  Too expensive to repurchase since the two I have are brand new and already ruined.

评论详情: This top was extremely tight on me, maybe because I have a bit of a belly or maybe the size just runs small. I didn’t like how tight it was everywhere overall. The feel and thickness of the fabric were good, and I loved the color of the garment and the square neckline, but the wrinkles the tightness made across my midsection and the unexpected shortness of the top were not welcome features.

The material was less thick, less supportive, on the sheerer side, and cannot see myself wearing without a bra. The review takes into account how much was paid.
